bosses.name: Altairus
bosses.note: You can run Heroic once per day and up to 10x Normal an hour

steps.title: Run Throne of the Four Winds
Run Firelands on both Normal and Heroic

bosses.name: Slabhide
bosses.note: You can run Heroic once per day and up to 10x Normal an hour

bosses.mount: Reins of the Heavenly Onyx Cloud Serpent

bosses.mount: Reins of the Astral Cloud Serpent
bosses.name: Elegon

bosses.mount: Reins of the Thundering Cobalt Cloud Serpent
bosses.name: Nalak

steps.title: Fly to Vale of the Eternal Blossoms
Portal to Zandalar / Kul'Tiras and take the Teleporter / Flight Path to Mechagon
Fly to Oribos, then Portal to The Maw
Run Sepulcher of the First Ones

steps.title: Flightpath to Dawn of the Infinites
Take the portal to the Emerald Dream in the Emerald Enclave
and Portal to Dornogal and then take the teleporter to Undermine
